page.title: 07RECREATION C. CROOKHAM
page.content: From our survey most children watched TV or video between 8 and 10 on a Saturday morning . Many families shop in local towns on Saturday morning to buy food and clothes. some buy snack lunches whilst shopping.A few families visited places of interest and friends.Many children played outside their houses for the greater part of the day when the weather permitted. {Local Facilities.} Peter Driver Sports Centre, Football, especially junior clubs, netball and badminton.Horse riding is very common. There are art classes and groups at Holy Trinty, Christ Church and Ewshot halls.There is a very successful and thriving Drama group_ The Christ Church Players and,although no music other than the church choirs is based here, there are many fine groups near.
